subject: Blockchain & Web3
title: What is Blockchain?
description: Understand blockchain through a simple story in 60 seconds.

hook.text: Your friend owes you $20. He says he paid. You say he didn't. Who's right?

buildup.text: Normally, you'd check the bank. But what if you don't trust the bank either?

discovery.text: What if there was a notebook everyone could see, but no one could erase?

twist.text: Every transaction gets written down. Everyone has a copy. Change one page? Everyone notices.

punchline.text: That's blockchain. A shared notebook that never lies.

quiz.question: Why can't anyone secretly change the blockchain?
options: Everyone has a copy of the records
